Reference

All functions

as_dataset()

Validate and coerce any object as dataset

as_data_dict()

Validate and coerce any object as data dictionary

as_data_dict_mlstr()

Validate and coerce any object as data dictionary in the Maelstrom format

as_data_dict_shape()

Validate and coerce any object as data dictionary

as_dossier()

Validate and coerce any object as dossier

as_taxonomy()

Validate and coerce any object as taxonomy

as_valueType()

Validate and coerce any object according to a given valueType

check_dataset_categories()

Return categorical values which differ between dataset and their data dictionary

check_dataset_valueType()

Return values which valueType differs between dataset and their data dictionary

check_dataset_variables()

Return undeclared variables across a data dictionary

check_data_dict_categories()

Return categorical variables which has issues in a data dictionary

check_data_dict_missing_categories()

Return categorical values which 'missing' column is not a boolean

check_data_dict_valueType()

Return evaluation of the valueType declared in a data dictionary

check_data_dict_variables()

Return non unique variables across a data dictionary

check_name_standards()

Return non-standard names across a vector

dataset_cat_as_labels()

Apply to categorical column(s) their labels declared in the data dictionary

dataset_evaluate()

Generate a report as an Excel spreadsheet of a dataset

dataset_summarize()

Generate a report as an Excel spreadsheet of a dossier (dataset list)

dataset_visualize()

Generate a web application (bookdown) report of list of a datasets

dataset_zap_data_dict()

Remove value labels of a data-frame, leaving its unlabelled columns

data_dict_apply()

Apply a data dictionary to any dataset

data_dict_evaluate()

Generate a report as an Excel spreadsheet of a data dictionary

data_dict_expand()

Transform a columns in a data dictionary component to a new component

data_dict_extract()

Create a data dictionary in the Maelstrom Research format from a dataset

data_dict_filter()

Subset data dictionary using column values

data_dict_flatten()

Transform a component in a data dictionary in column(s) in another component

data_dict_group_by()

Group listed data dictionaries using column names

data_dict_group_split()

Split grouped data dictionaries into a named list

data_dict_list_nest()

Regroup listed split data dictionaries

data_dict_match_dataset()

Inner join between any dataset and data_dict variables

data_dict_opalr_fix()

Transform a data dictionary object from opalr to Opal format

data_dict_pivot_longer()

Turn column(s) in a data dictionary component into their longer equivalent

data_dict_pivot_wider()

Turn column(s) in a data dictionary component into their wider equivalent

data_dict_ungroup()

Ungroup data dictionaries

data_extract()

Create an empty dataset from a data dictionary

DEMO_files

Built-in material allowing the user to test the package with demo material

dossier_create()

Create a dossier as a list of datasets

dossier_evaluate()

Generate an Excel spreadsheet report of a dataset list (called dossier)

dossier_summarize()

Generate an Excel spreadsheet report of a dossier (dataset list)

is_dataset()

Evaluate if any object is a dataset or not

is_data_dict()

Evaluate if any object is a data dictionary or not

is_data_dict_mlstr()

Evaluate if any object is a Maelstrom formatted data dictionary or not

is_data_dict_shape()

Evaluate if any object is a potential data dictionary

is_dossier()

Evaluate if any object is a dossier or not

is_taxonomy()

Evaluate if any object is a taxonomy scheme or not

is_valueType()

Evaluate if any object is a valid valueType name or not

madshapR_help()

Call the help center for full documentation

opal_files_pull()

Download files from an Opal environment

opal_files_push()

Upload files to an Opal environment

opal_project_create()

Create a project in an Opal environment

opal_tables_pull()

Download tables from an Opal project as a dossier

opal_tables_push()

Upload datasets into an Opal environment as tables in an Opal project

open_visual_report()

Open a visual report in a browser

resume_variables()

Generate a tibble resuming all variables present in a dataset

summary_variables()

Provide statistical description of variables present in a dataset

summary_variables_categorical()

Provide statistical description of 'categorical' variables of a dataset

summary_variables_date()

Provide statistical description of 'date' variables of a dataset

summary_variables_numerical()

Provide statistical description of 'numerical' variables of a dataset

summary_variables_text()

Provide statistical description of 'text' variables of a dataset

taxonomy_opal_get()

Get the taxonomy as used by Opal

taxonomy_opal_mlstr_get()

Get the taxonomy as used by Maelstrom Research

valueType_adjust()

Replace the valueType from (or to) any data dictionary to (or from) dataset

valueType_guess()

Guess the first possible valueType of any object

valueType_list

Give list of authorized valueType values

valueType_of()

Give the valueType of any object

valueType_self_adjust()

Search and replace the valueType of any data dictionary or dataset

variable_visualize()

Generate a combined plot of a variable in a dataset

Contents
